insert into role (createdDate, lastModifiedDate, version, description, isSystem, `name`, permissions) values (#{createddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastmodifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issystem,jdbcType=BIT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissions,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update role set createdDate = #{createddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, lastModifiedDate = #{lastmodifieddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, version = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, isSystem = #{issystem,jdbcType=BIT}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permissions = #{permissions,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, createdDate, lastModifiedDate, version, description, isSystem, `name`, permissions from role where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, createdDate, lastModifiedDate, version, description, isSystem, `name`, permissions from role
